basic.blooming: Flowering period April-June, fruiting period June-August
basic.color: Flower color yellow, fruit color brown, black brown

maintenance.soil: Soil with loose texture or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Likes half shade, grows in places with scattered light
maintenance.watering: Likes wet environments, water thoroughly when soil is dry, avoid saturated water
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove aged tissues, dead and pest branches timely
